title: Is it weird that so many childless adults go to Disneyland? Ask me, I'm one of them
text:
Annabel, a childless millennial, ventured into Disneyland California alone to find out if it was heaven or hell

"Disney World is for children! People without children need to be banned!" - this was the rallying cry of a mother whose furious Facebook rant went viral over the summer.

The post, far too expletive-ridden to be presented within this article, argued that "immature millennials" were to blame for a long queue at the Mickey pretzel stand, which ultimately "broke [her son's] poor little heart" and led him to cry.

Mothers with children, she went on, "should be allowed to skip all the lines", and to wrap it up: "I f****** hate childless women with a burning passion!" The anonymous diatribe...
